name: Five Nights at Ninjago's
description:
A fnaf fan game about Ninjago (Was brother's idea).

Story:
Master Chen's Noodle Factory is reopening, after 5 years, with the death of Skylar Amber (known as the Amber Ninja, she didn't want any association from her father). You are Lily Hoodlock, a humble 19 year old graduate from college. She goes and becomes the night guard, unaware of the circumstances...

Gameplay:
Gameplay is similar to a fnaf fan game, use the mouse.

Each character is held back differently as you manage the temperature and send off sounds and signals to pull the 6 ninja back.

The game is hard.... trust me. You are going to 9am

P.S On the new game and continue screen, click the computer and it should give you an e-mail system. This helps you with the game.

Credits:
Nothing is owned by me. Scott Cawthon owns fnaf. LEGO Group owns Ninjago.
Many sounds are from freesound.org

This game is non-profit and made for fun ;)

Features:

- 6 Night game with a backstory
- Drawn in Clickteam graphics
- Custom Night with 10 challenges
- Much more coming soon in updates...

If any bugs are found, leave in the comments on this page!

#fnaf
#other
